subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: SAN JOSE, Calif. (AP) — San Jose center Jeremy Roenick has been around playoff hockey long enough to know what would happen next when six Calgary Flames in a row went to the penalty box in Game 2 of their first-round series against the Sharks.
